channel.title: Bank nulling?
channel.description:
Hey, was messing around on my server and so I decided to fill my bank up. I did this in game and not by char files, and I didnt' see any nulls as I filled it. The only thing I did in char files was increase every number to max (2147483647). I tried logging back in and I got the error connecting to server. I logged in on another account fine. So I deleted my char file and just pasted the bank back in but with a quantity of 5 for each item instead of max. It didn't help. I don't see any errors but maybe I'm blind. Here's the bank code. Oh and its a PI/DSPK. ( In the code paste the number spacing looks off but in the real code the 5's are 1 tab away from the Id)
[code] [BANK] character-bank = 0 15273 5 character-bank = 1 15814 5 character-bank = 2 559 5 character-bank = 3 558 5 character-bank = 4 9076 5 character-bank = 5 561 5 character-bank = 6 562 5 item.title: Bank nulling?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Different tabbing, you would have to retab everything so they’re evenly put out. That’s what is causing your nulling issue.

Read full topic

item.title: Bank nulling?
item.dc:creator: @Josephx Josephx
item.description:
@Josephx wrote:

Hey, was messing around on my server and so I decided to fill my bank up. I did this in game and not by char files, and I didnt’ see any nulls as I filled it. The only thing I did in char files was increase every number to max (2147483647). I tried logging back in and I got the error connecting to server. I logged in on another account fine. So I deleted my char file and just pasted the bank back in but with a quantity of 5 for each item instead of max. It didn’t help. I don’t see any errors but maybe I’m blind. Here’s the bank code. Oh and its a PI/DSPK. ( In the code paste the number spacing looks off but in the real code the 5’s are 1 tab away from the Id)
